text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Employer" means any person that employs an individual in the State.
"Knowingly" means having actual knowledge, deliberate ignorance, or reckless disregard for the truth.

section.section: "Place of business" means the office or headquarters of the employer.
"Place of business" does not include a work site at which the employer has been contracted to perform services.

text.section:
"Public body" means:
the State;
a unit of State government or an instrumentality of the State; or
any political subdivision, agency, person, or entity that is a party to a contract for which 50% or more of the money used is State money.
